Hi,

I would like to unit test JSP's. After going through junit.org I understand
that JSP's can be tested either
using cactus or HttpUnit. Can you advice me on which tool should I go in
for? What is the difference between these 2 tools?

Regards
Narendra
subject: Should I use Cactus or HttpUnit?
